Package bridge.toolkit.util

Class Summary
CopyDirectory Copies all the files from one directory to another.
DMParser Provides a way to find the any referenced data model codes referenced in a file.
Keys The static values of the keys to be used in the Context class.
SCOContentDMChecker Checks to see if a S1000D data module is a 4.1 SCO content data module.
StylesheetApplier Provides the ability to apply style sheets to the data modules.
URNMapper Generates a urn_resource_map.xml file that is used to map each file in the resource package by file name to the S1000D URN.
XMLParser Provides a way to find the any values in an XML document using JDOM.
